sentences.en: a Japanese version of an English play
sentences.cn: 一部英国戏剧的日语版

sentences.en: a slightly different version
sentences.cn: 略有不同的说法

sentences.en: A special remastered version of Casablanca is being released.
sentences.cn: 重新录制的特别版《卡萨布兰卡》发行了。

sentences.en: a stripped-down version of the song
sentences.cn: 这首歌的精简版

sentences.en: Could Donna’s version of what happened that night be correct?
sentences.cn: 唐娜对那晚发生的事情的描述是否正确呢？

sentences.en: He asked to see the amended version.
sentences.cn: 他要求看修订本。

sentences.en: His version of what happened is incorrect.
sentences.cn: 他对所发生的事情的说法不准确。

sentences.en: In my version of the story, I added some new material.
sentences.cn: 我在讲述这个故事时加入了新的素材。

sentences.en: Is the coffee break the adult version of recess?
sentences.cn: 工间喝咖啡是成人的休息方式吗？

sentences.en: It was first published in 1914 in a highly expurgated version.
sentences.cn: 它初版于1914年，当时删除了大量内容。

sentences.en: She beguiled them into believing her version of events.
sentences.cn: 她哄骗他们相信了她叙述的事情。

sentences.en: The ancient Egyptians saw paradise as an idealized version of their own lives.
sentences.cn: 古埃及人把天堂视为他们现实生活的理想形式。

sentences.en: The English version of the novel is due for publication next year.
sentences.cn: 这部小说的英文译本预定明年出版发行。

sentences.en: The film is available in a colorized version.
sentences.cn: 这部电影有彩色版。

sentences.en: the human version of mad cow disease
sentences.cn: 疯牛病的人类变体

sentences.en: The plane was a modified version of the C-130.
sentences.cn: 这种飞机是C-130的改进机型。

sentences.en: The review body has produced a truncated version of its annual report.
sentences.cn: 该评论机构出版了其年报的删节版本。

sentences.en: The second-hand version is a poor copy of the original.
sentences.cn: 盗版版本是对原版的低劣复制。

sentences.en: Their versions of how the accident happened conflict.
sentences.cn: 他们对事故发生情况的说法相互矛盾。

sentences.en: There's nothing Mickey Mouse about the 1993 version.
sentences.cn: 1993年的版本一点儿也不简单。

sentences.en: This new piece of evidence invalidates his version of events.
sentences.cn: 这条新证据推翻了他对事件经过的说法。

trans.tran_cn: 变体，版本，（从不同角度的）描述，说法，改编形式
trans.tran_en: a copy of something that has been changed so that it is slightly different
